data.claim: Verification tools must be HONEST about what they can and cannot resolve. A confident-sounding lie (hardcoded Tailwind palette that may not match project config) is worse than saying "I don't know" (unresolved with confidence=0). Truth sources: (1) Arbitrary values like bg-[#8B5CF6], (2) CSS vars resolved from actual project files. Everything else should be marked as "best-effort" or "unresolved" with appropriate low confidence.
